title: 108_hr1283
content: New Automobile Add-On Disclosure and Consumer Protection Act - Requires each dealer to disclose to each consumer that purchases a new automobile: (1) a dealer add-on invoice. And (2) a dealer add-on warranty statement. Specifies the timing of such disclosures. States that dealer violation of this Act results in liability to the United States for a civil penalty of not more than $10,000 or the total cost of the new automobile involved , whichever is greater. Permits a private right of action by a consumer aggrieved by a violation of this Act.
